summary: SummaryBio Ionic's Long Barrel Curling Iron is 2" longer than the average curling iron, making it easier to curl long hair or back sections on shorter styles.
details: DetailsBenefitsHair moisture is locked in with a combination of NanoIonic MX and Bio Ionic Moisturizing HeatCreates loose waves and soft curlsLonger barrel makes it easier to reach back sections on long or short hairWorry-free with 1-hour auto shut offComfortable to use with cool-touch gripFeaturesCeramic Mineral ComplexPTC HeaterFar Infrared HeatAdjustable HeatSwivel Cord1-Hour Automatic Shut-OffWattage Rating: 73Temperature: 430 degrees FahrenheitWeight (without cord): 10.0 oz (1")/11.0 oz (1.25")Cord Length: 9 ft1-Year Manufacturer's WarrantyItem 2576060How To UseThe extended barrel design allows you to curl the back of your head easier whether the hair is short or long.
how_to_use: The extended barrel design allows you to curl the back of your head easier whether the hair is short or long.

reviews.headline: Worth the price!!
reviews.comments: I previously used the T3 brand, but I decided to try out this brand after seeing multiple positive reviews. It is so easy to use/get used to! I've been using it for about 2 weeks now & I would recommend it.

reviews.headline: Definitely worth the price
reviews.comments: I've had previous curlers but nothing beats the 1" Bio Ionic curler. I've got so many complements with the curls the wand leaves. My hair normally doesn't hold curls all day so I was amazed when my curls lasted all day long using this curler.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: This curling iron would not hold curl in my hair. I returned it and bought the T3. I am extremely happy with that one!

reviews.headline: Loved the curls
reviews.comments: Was wanting a good quality 1in barrel, im glad I went with this one. Your hair just glides on it, my curls lasted throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Its worth the money
reviews.comments: Loved it, very smooth did not pull of my hair once clamped. Its expensive but worth it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: The best curling iron I have used. Better than the T3. Hair does not snag or get caught in the clamp. Heats up fast and you can lock in the temperature so you don't accidentally change it while using.

reviews.headline: Don't Fall For It!
reviews.comments: Cannot hold a curl AT ALL. I've owned multiple curling irons/wands from other brands and NEVER had this issue. My hair typically stays curled until I wash it. I have long hair, so I fell for the long barrel marketing. I've tried multiple times with different heat settings and products, and the curls fall out before you can leave the house. Within an hour, my hair is completely straight again. The clamp isn't very strong either.. hair easily slips out of it. I wish this worked!

reviews.headline: Must have for long hair!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This curling iron is a game changer, especially if you have long hair. The extended barrel makes it so much easier to wrap bigger sections without overlapping or creating awkward bends, and it heats up quickly and evenly. The curls come out smooth, shiny, and frizz-free, thanks to the Bio Ionic technology that seems to lock in moisture instead of frying my ends.

reviews.headline: Perfect For Tight Curls
reviews.comments: I like the long barrel because it helps get at the root of your hair

reviews.headline: The best curling iron ever!
reviews.comments: My hair stylist recommended this one and i bought it right away. Ive always had problems holding a curl. They'd just fall right out an hour or two after curling it no matter what i did. I tried using different curling irons, different hair products, tried pinning up my curls for 30 minutes and nothing worked. I finally tried this one and did it the same way my hairstylist did it; root lifter at the roots, texturizing spray and only held each curl for a few seconds and wow! So quick and it came out beautifully and even stayed until the next day which never happens! My new fave ü´∂

reviews.headline: Best curler I've ever used!
reviews.comments: Significant improvement from other curling irons I've used before. I have thin, fine hair that's easily damaged. Will be using this one for a while!!!

reviews.headline: Amazing Curling Iron
reviews.comments: I have long, thick and wavy hair. This long barrel is everything. My hair actually fits on the barrel. It makes it fast and easy to get beautiful curls. So happy with my purchase! Def recommend.

reviews.headline: Best curling iron
reviews.comments: My stylist uses this curling iron and my curls lasted, didn't drop or frizz my hair.  I've tried many brands, barrel finishes and barrel lengths.  I was beginning to think it was me, not the curling iron.  Finally purchased this one and wished I would have bought it sooner!  My hair is a chin length bob and it took me a few minutes for perfect, loose curls.  The longer barrel is so much easier to use.  Perfect, smooth, stay put curls!  Buy it if your hair is hard to curl, you'll love it!

reviews.headline: I Like This But
reviews.comments: I bought this at 20 percent off. Now there is an even bigger sale on it.  This is what I do not like about Ulta.

reviews.headline: I love this ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: I have the 1 inch and love that one, I bought the 1.25 and I also love this one. Just depends on what kind of waves you are looking for

reviews.headline: Mine snapped in half
reviews.comments: I curled my hair, unplugged it and the entire barrel fell off the iron‚Ä¶,

reviews.headline: Incredible product and worth the price!
reviews.comments: My daughter come with me to buy this, and I am so grateful she did. The extended barrel is phenomenal, it makes curling the entire head of hair so much easier. The heat settings are exceptional, very easy to use, it does not pull or tug at the Hair. Extremely satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this curling iron. It does not snag or get stuck when pulling through. I love that the barrel is long and how my curls come out at the end. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Smooth Curling!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this curling iron! It doesn't burn your hair and holds your curls beautifully. The smooth styling it provides is fantastic, and unlike other curling irons, it doesn't tangle up in the handle. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: barrel
reviews.comments: I was mid cuing my hair when I opened the clamp and the whole barrel snapped off :(

media.headline: Another great styling tool from Bioionic!

faceoff_positive.comments: This works. It is a solid, well built tool that gets your hair smooth and how you want on the lowet heat (I am Caucasian and have fine hair with a light, unruly curl that has lost its shine). I thought irons were irons, I'd buy the cheapest thing and thought that was equal. I reached a plateau and I just couldn't get my hair to look good anymore. So after watching some professional hair stylists doing styles I wanted for my hair, I looked at what they were using - duh. They are ALL using more advanced tools but many were using Ion related ones. I work in tech and here I was using1980's styling tools and getting 1980's results (ever see an 80's movie? Yeah). I looked at the price and I'd seen even more expensive irons at Utla (that's a designated beauty store here in the west coast U.S.) and I don't recall seeing anything this size with ION capabilities or with the materials used in the barrel. I ordered mine online and had it in about a week. FIRST shot at a curl and I realized I've been styling my hair under a rock all these years. I'm over the moon about my purchase. This is really only 40 bucks or so more than the best tool you can buy in conventional stores/Amazon. This is THE BEST TOOL FOR THE JOB. It just slides through my hair too! That doesn't seem like a point that makes much sense...of course it slides through your hair, all irons are smooth etc..Not like this. It feels like it moves over your hair and the heat is distributed so much more gently..My hair looks and feels SO MUCH HEALTHIER. I don't write reviews but when this popped up in my inbox I felt compelled to share with someone who was also about to give up on their hair. Love the iron, best beauty tool I've ever bought.
faceoff_positive.headline: The right tool

faceoff_negative.comments: There are serious issues with the spring that allows you to open and close the iron to curl. It's like the spring gets too hot, softens, and ends up stuck and the iron won't close all the way to secure the hair.  I use the tool the way it is intended. I am not rough or overload the barrell with too much hair. There is no excuse. I give the tool 2 stars rathee than one for the simple fact that I love this curling iron before it breaks. The long barrel is such a luxury to have with my long hair. Unfortunatley at this point i would rathee invest my money on a different brand. Even if it means the barrell will be shorter.  I have dealt with this issue TWICE within 6 months. The first experience was less than 15 minutes after unboxing the iron and using it for the first time. ULTA was great and replaced the iron same day free of charge. However I found myself in the same situation this weekend while on vacation. With my experience I've determined the malfunction is inevitable. After losing 2 irons due to the same issues, its clearly not an IF but a WHEN it will happen. Bio Ionic should take responsibility for these errors and make it right with the customers and ULTA. With this curling iron being an investment hair tool, these issues should not happen this often. Sadly, after reading other reviews, ive learned i'm not the first to incounter these problems.  Please let me be clear, this is a BIO IONIC problem, NOT* and ULTA problem.
faceoff_negative.headline: DO NOT RECOMMEND!
